optional_parameters.name: mime_types
optional_parameters.description: The "mime_types" parameter is an optional setting that accepts a comma-delimited string of image types, including 'gif', 'jpg', and 'png'. By default, if user doesn't mention anything, it returns images of all available types, which are 'jpg', 'gif', and 'png'.

optional_parameters.name: order
optional_parameters.description: The "order" parameter is an optional parameter that specifies the desired order in which to return results. It can be set to one of three options: 'RANDOM' to retrieve results in a random order, 'ASC' to retrieve results in ascending order, or 'DESC' to retrieve results in descending order. The default order is set to 'RANDOM' if no specific order is specified.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: The "limit" parameter is an optional integer value that specifies the number of results to be returned. It allows you to request up to a maximum of 25 results, with the default value being set to 1 if no specific limit is provided.

optional_parameters.name: breeds
optional_parameters.description: The "breeds" parameter is an optional field that accepts a comma-delimited string of breed abbreviations, allowing users to specify one or more specific breeds when making a request or query.

api_list.api_description: Make a travel or hotel booking

required_parameters.name: booking_type
required_parameters.description: The parameter booking_type allows users to choose between different booking types, including 'hotels', 'trip tickets', or both simultaneously.

required_parameters.name: means_of_transportation
required_parameters.description: The parameter "means_of_transportation" allows users to choose a transportation type from options including 'flight', 'train', 'bus', or 'cruise'. The default transportation_type is set to 'None' if no specific transportation type is specified.

required_parameters.name: location_from
required_parameters.description: The "location_from" parameter specifies the departure location. The default "location_from" value is set to 'None' if no origin is specified or if the user is not booking a travel ticket.

required_parameters.name: location_to
required_parameters.description: The "location_to" parameter allows you to specify the arrival location. The default "location_to" value is set to 'None' if no destination is specified or if the user is not booking a travel ticket.

required_parameters.name: min_price_ticket
required_parameters.description: The parameter "min_price_ticket" is used to establish the minimum price at which the user wants to buy tickets for. The default minimum price is set to 'None' if nothing is specified.

required_parameters.name: max_price_ticket
required_parameters.description: The parameter "max_price_ticket" is used to establish the maximum price at which the user wants to buy tickets for. The default maximum price is set to 'None' if nothing is specified.

required_parameters.name: num_adults
required_parameters.description: The parameter "num_adults" represents the number of adults. The default number of adults is set to 'None' if nothing is specified.

required_parameters.name: num_children
required_parameters.description: The parameter "num_children" represents the number of children. The default number of children is set to 'None' if nothing is specified.

required_parameters.name: departure_date
required_parameters.description: The "departure_date" parameter represents the departure date for a trip when booking trip tickets. The date must be in comma separated month, date, year. The default departure date is set to 'None' if nothing is specified.

required_parameters.name: return_date
required_parameters.description: The "return_date" parameter allows the user to specify the return date for a trip. The date must be in comma separated month, date, year. The default return date is set to 'None' if nothing is specified.

required_parameters.name: location
required_parameters.description: The "location" parameter is to set the location for the search area. The default hotel location is set to 'None' if nothing is specified.

required_parameters.name: checkin_date
required_parameters.description: The parameter "checkin_date" is used to establish the date for checking into a hotel. The date must be in comma separated month, date, year. The default checkin date is set to 'None' if nothing is specified or if the user is not booking a hotel.

required_parameters.name: checkout_date
required_parameters.description: The parameter "checkout_date" is used to establish the date for checking out of a hotel. The date must be in comma separated month, date, year. The default checkout date is set to 'None' if nothing is specified or if the user is not booking a hotel.

required_parameters.name: num_rooms
required_parameters.description: The parameter "num_rooms" allows users to specify the number of hotel rooms they intend to book. The default number of rooms is set to 'None' if nothing is specified or if the user is not booking a hotel.

required_parameters.name: room_type
required_parameters.description: The parameter "room_type" allows users to choose the type of hotel room they prefer from a selection that includes 'King Bed', 'Queen Bed', 'Double', and 'Luxury'. The default room type is set to 'None' if nothing is specified or if the user is not booking a hotel.

required_parameters.name: min_price_room
required_parameters.description: The parameter "min_price_room" allows for establishing the minimum price for hotel rooms. The default minimum room price is set to 'None' if nothing is specified or if the user is not booking a hotel.

required_parameters.name: max_price_room
required_parameters.description: The parameter "max_price_room" allows for establishing the maximum price for hotel rooms. The default maximum room price is set to 'None' if nothing is specified or if the user is not booking a hotel.

optional_parameters.name: mime_types
optional_parameters.description: The "mime_types" parameter is an optional setting that accepts a comma-delimited string of image types, including 'gif', 'jpg', and 'png'. By default, if user doesn't mention anything, it returns images of all available types, which are 'jpg', 'gif', and 'png'.

optional_parameters.name: order
optional_parameters.description: The "order" parameter is an optional parameter that specifies the desired order in which to return results. It can be set to one of three options: 'RANDOM' to retrieve results in a random order, 'ASC' to retrieve results in ascending order, or 'DESC' to retrieve results in descending order. The default order is set to 'RANDOM' if no specific order is specified.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: The "limit" parameter is an optional integer value that specifies the number of results to be returned. It allows you to request up to a maximum of 25 results, with the default value being set to 1 if no specific limit is provided.

optional_parameters.name: breeds
optional_parameters.description: The "breeds" parameter is an optional field that accepts a comma-delimited string of breed abbreviations, allowing users to specify one or more specific breeds when making a request or query.

optional_parameters.name: size
optional_parameters.description: The "size" parameter, which is optional, determines the size of the image to be returned and can be set to one of three options: 'small', 'med', or 'full'. The default size, if not specified, is 'med'.

optional_parameters.name: mime_types
optional_parameters.description: The "mime_types" parameter is an optional setting that accepts a comma-delimited string of image types, including 'gif', 'jpg', and 'png'. By default, if user doesn't mention anything, it returns images of all available types, which are 'jpg', 'gif', and 'png'.

optional_parameters.name: order
optional_parameters.description: The "order" parameter is an optional parameter that specifies the desired order in which to return results. It can be set to one of three options: 'RANDOM' to retrieve results in a random order, 'ASC' to retrieve results in ascending order, or 'DESC' to retrieve results in descending order. The default order is set to 'RANDOM' if no specific order is specified.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: The "limit" parameter is an optional integer value that specifies the number of results to be returned. It allows you to request up to a maximum of 25 results, with the default value being set to 1 if no specific limit is provided.

optional_parameters.name: breeds
optional_parameters.description: The "breeds" parameter is an optional field that accepts a comma-delimited string of breed abbreviations, allowing users to specify one or more specific breeds when making a request or query.

api_list.api_description: Make a travel or hotel booking

required_parameters.name: booking_type
required_parameters.description: The parameter booking_type allows users to choose between different booking types, including 'hotels', 'trip tickets', or both simultaneously.

required_parameters.name: means_of_transportation
required_parameters.description: The parameter "means_of_transportation" allows users to choose a transportation type from options including 'flight', 'train', 'bus', or 'cruise'. The default transportation_type is set to 'None' if no specific transportation type is specified.

required_parameters.name: location_from
required_parameters.description: The "location_from" parameter specifies the departure location. The default "location_from" value is set to 'None' if no origin is specified or if the user is not booking a travel ticket.

required_parameters.name: location_to
required_parameters.description: The "location_to" parameter allows you to specify the arrival location. The default "location_to" value is set to 'None' if no destination is specified or if the user is not booking a travel ticket.

required_parameters.name: min_price_ticket
required_parameters.description: The parameter "min_price_ticket" is used to establish the minimum price at which the user wants to buy tickets for. The default minimum price is set to 'None' if nothing is specified.

required_parameters.name: max_price_ticket
required_parameters.description: The parameter "max_price_ticket" is used to establish the maximum price at which the user wants to buy tickets for. The default maximum price is set to 'None' if nothing is specified.

required_parameters.name: num_adults
required_parameters.description: The parameter "num_adults" represents the number of adults. The default number of adults is set to 'None' if nothing is specified.

required_parameters.name: num_children
required_parameters.description: The parameter "num_children" represents the number of children. The default number of children is set to 'None' if nothing is specified.

required_parameters.name: departure_date
required_parameters.description: The "departure_date" parameter represents the departure date for a trip when booking trip tickets. The date must be in comma separated month, date, year. The default departure date is set to 'None' if nothing is specified.

required_parameters.name: return_date
required_parameters.description: The "return_date" parameter allows the user to specify the return date for a trip. The date must be in comma separated month, date, year. The default return date is set to 'None' if nothing is specified.

required_parameters.name: location
required_parameters.description: The "location" parameter is to set the location for the search area. The default hotel location is set to 'None' if nothing is specified.

required_parameters.name: checkin_date
required_parameters.description: The parameter "checkin_date" is used to establish the date for checking into a hotel. The date must be in comma separated month, date, year. The default checkin date is set to 'None' if nothing is specified or if the user is not booking a hotel.

required_parameters.name: checkout_date
required_parameters.description: The parameter "checkout_date" is used to establish the date for checking out of a hotel. The date must be in comma separated month, date, year. The default checkout date is set to 'None' if nothing is specified or if the user is not booking a hotel.

required_parameters.name: num_rooms
required_parameters.description: The parameter "num_rooms" allows users to specify the number of hotel rooms they intend to book. The default number of rooms is set to 'None' if nothing is specified or if the user is not booking a hotel.

required_parameters.name: room_type
required_parameters.description: The parameter "room_type" allows users to choose the type of hotel room they prefer from a selection that includes 'King Bed', 'Queen Bed', 'Double', and 'Luxury'. The default room type is set to 'None' if nothing is specified or if the user is not booking a hotel.

required_parameters.name: min_price_room
required_parameters.description: The parameter "min_price_room" allows for establishing the minimum price for hotel rooms. The default minimum room price is set to 'None' if nothing is specified or if the user is not booking a hotel.

required_parameters.name: max_price_room
required_parameters.description: The parameter "max_price_room" allows for establishing the maximum price for hotel rooms. The default maximum room price is set to 'None' if nothing is specified or if the user is not booking a hotel.

optional_parameters.name: mime_types

optional_parameters.name: order
optional_parameters.description: The "order" parameter is an optional parameter that specifies the desired order in which to return results. It can be set to one of three options: 'RANDOM' to retrieve results in a random order, 'ASC' to retrieve results in ascending order, or 'DESC' to retrieve results in descending order. The default order is set to 'RANDOM' if no specific order is specified.

optional_parameters.name: limit

optional_parameters.name: breeds

api_list.api_description: Make a travel or hotel booking

required_parameters.name: booking_type
required_parameters.description: The parameter booking_type allows users to choose between different booking types, including 'hotels', 'trip tickets', or both simultaneously.

required_parameters.name: means_of_transportation
required_parameters.description: The parameter "means_of_transportation" allows users to choose a transportation type from options including 'flight', 'train', 'bus', or 'cruise'. The default transportation_type is set to 'None' if no specific transportation type is specified.

required_parameters.name: location_from
required_parameters.description: The "location_from" parameter specifies the departure location. The default "location_from" value is set to 'None' if no origin is specified or if the user is not booking a travel ticket.

required_parameters.name: location_to
required_parameters.description: The "location_to" parameter allows you to specify the arrival location. The default "location_to" value is set to 'None' if no destination is specified or if the user is not booking a travel ticket.

required_parameters.name: min_price_ticket
required_parameters.description: The parameter "min_price_ticket" is used to establish the minimum price at which the user wants to buy tickets for. The default minimum price is set to 'None' if nothing is specified.

required_parameters.name: max_price_ticket
required_parameters.description: The parameter "max_price_ticket" is used to establish the maximum price at which the user wants to buy tickets for. The default maximum price is set to 'None' if nothing is specified.

required_parameters.name: num_adults
required_parameters.description: The parameter "num_adults" represents the number of adults. The default number of adults is set to 'None' if nothing is specified.

required_parameters.name: num_children
required_parameters.description: The parameter "num_children" represents the number of children. The default number of children is set to 'None' if nothing is specified.

required_parameters.name: departure_date
required_parameters.description: The "departure_date" parameter represents the departure date for a trip when booking trip tickets. The date must be in comma separated month, date, year. The default departure date is set to 'None' if nothing is specified.

required_parameters.name: return_date
required_parameters.description: The "return_date" parameter allows the user to specify the return date for a trip. The date must be in comma separated month, date, year. The default return date is set to 'None' if nothing is specified.

required_parameters.name: location
required_parameters.description: The "location" parameter is to set the location for the search area. The default hotel location is set to 'None' if nothing is specified.

required_parameters.name: checkin_date
required_parameters.description: The parameter "checkin_date" is used to establish the date for checking into a hotel. The date must be in comma separated month, date, year. The default checkin date is set to 'None' if nothing is specified or if the user is not booking a hotel.

required_parameters.name: checkout_date
required_parameters.description: The parameter "checkout_date" is used to establish the date for checking out of a hotel. The date must be in comma separated month, date, year. The default checkout date is set to 'None' if nothing is specified or if the user is not booking a hotel.

required_parameters.name: num_rooms
required_parameters.description: The parameter "num_rooms" allows users to specify the number of hotel rooms they intend to book. The default number of rooms is set to 'None' if nothing is specified or if the user is not booking a hotel.

required_parameters.name: room_type
required_parameters.description: The parameter "room_type" allows users to choose the type of hotel room they prefer from a selection that includes 'King Bed', 'Queen Bed', 'Double', and 'Luxury'. The default room type is set to 'None' if nothing is specified or if the user is not booking a hotel.

required_parameters.name: min_price_room
required_parameters.description: The parameter "min_price_room" allows for establishing the minimum price for hotel rooms. The default minimum room price is set to 'None' if nothing is specified or if the user is not booking a hotel.

required_parameters.name: max_price_room
required_parameters.description: The parameter "max_price_room" allows for establishing the maximum price for hotel rooms. The default maximum room price is set to 'None' if nothing is specified or if the user is not booking a hotel.

api_list.api_description: Search homes for buying or renting

required_parameters.name: location
required_parameters.description: The "location" parameter is to set the location for the search area. The default hotel location is set to 'None' if nothing is specified.

required_parameters.description: The "home_type" parameter represents home types for search. For home buying, home_types choices are: "House", "Townhouse", "Condo", "Land", "Multi-family", "Mobile", "Co-op"; for home renting, home_types choices are: "House", "Townhouse", "Condo", "Apartment". The default select_home_type is set to 'None' if nothing is specified.

required_parameters.name: buy_or_rent
required_parameters.description: The "buy_or_rent" parameter is to specify whether to search homes for buying or renting. It can be chosen from 'buy' or 'rent'.

required_parameters.name: floor_number
required_parameters.description: The "floor_number" parameter represents the floor number. The default floor_number is set to 'None' if nothing is specified.

required_parameters.name: max_commute_time
required_parameters.description: The "max_commute_time" parameter represents the maximum commute time in minute to office location, assuming the office location is already defined. The default max_commute_time is set to 'None' if nothing is specified.

required_parameters.name: max_price
required_parameters.description: The "max_price" parameter represents the maximum home price in dollars. The default max_price is set to 'None' if nothing is specified.

required_parameters.name: max_square_feet

required_parameters.description: The "min_square_feet" parameter represents the minimum home size in square feet. The default min_square_feet is set to 'None' if nothing is specified.

required_parameters.description: The "num_balconies" parameter represents the number of balconies. The default num_balconies is set to 'None' if nothing is specified.

required_parameters.name: num_baths

required_parameters.name: num_beds

required_parameters.name: num_garages

optional_parameters.name: order

It can be set to one of three options: 'RANDOM' to retrieve results in a random order, 'ASC' to retrieve results in ascending order, or 'DESC' to retrieve results in descending order. The default order is set to 'RANDOM' if no specific order is specified.

optional_parameters.name: breeds

api_list.api_description: Make a travel or hotel booking

required_parameters.name: booking_type
required_parameters.description: The parameter booking_type allows users to choose between different booking types, including 'hotels', 'trip tickets', or both simultaneously.

required_parameters.name: means_of_transportation
required_parameters.description: The parameter "means_of_transportation" allows users to choose a transportation type from options including 'flight', 'train', 'bus', or 'cruise'. The default transportation_type is set to 'None' if no specific transportation type is specified.

required_parameters.name: location_from
required_parameters.description: The "location_from" parameter specifies the departure location. The default "location_from" value is set to 'None' if no origin is specified or if the user is not booking a travel ticket.

required_parameters.name: location_to
required_parameters.description: The "location_to" parameter allows you to specify the arrival location. The default "location_to" value is set to 'None' if no destination is specified or if the user is not booking a travel ticket.

required_parameters.name: min_price_ticket
required_parameters.description: The parameter "min_price_ticket" is used to establish the minimum price at which the user wants to buy tickets for. The default minimum price is set to 'None' if nothing is specified.

required_parameters.name: max_price_ticket
required_parameters.description: The parameter "max_price_ticket" is used to establish the maximum price at which the user wants to buy tickets for. The default maximum price is set to 'None' if nothing is specified.

required_parameters.name: num_adults
required_parameters.description: The parameter "num_adults" represents the number of adults. The default number of adults is set to 'None' if nothing is specified.

required_parameters.name: num_children
required_parameters.description: The parameter "num_children" represents the number of children. The default number of children is set to 'None' if nothing is specified.

required_parameters.name: departure_date
required_parameters.description: The "departure_date" parameter represents the departure date for a trip when booking trip tickets. The date must be in comma separated month, date, year. The default departure date is set to 'None' if nothing is specified.

required_parameters.name: return_date
required_parameters.description: The "return_date" parameter allows the user to specify the return date for a trip. The date must be in comma separated month, date, year. The default return date is set to 'None' if nothing is specified.

required_parameters.name: location
required_parameters.description: The "location" parameter is to set the location for the search area. The default hotel location is set to 'None' if nothing is specified.

required_parameters.name: checkin_date
required_parameters.description: The parameter "checkin_date" is used to establish the date for checking into a hotel. The date must be in comma separated month, date, year. The default checkin date is set to 'None' if nothing is specified or if the user is not booking a hotel.

required_parameters.name: checkout_date
required_parameters.description: The parameter "checkout_date" is used to establish the date for checking out of a hotel. The date must be in comma separated month, date, year. The default checkout date is set to 'None' if nothing is specified or if the user is not booking a hotel.

required_parameters.name: num_rooms
required_parameters.description: The parameter "num_rooms" allows users to specify the number of hotel rooms they intend to book. The default number of rooms is set to 'None' if nothing is specified or if the user is not booking a hotel.

required_parameters.name: room_type
required_parameters.description: The parameter "room_type" allows users to choose the type of hotel room they prefer from a selection that includes 'King Bed', 'Queen Bed', 'Double', and 'Luxury'. The default room type is set to 'None' if nothing is specified or if the user is not booking a hotel.

required_parameters.name: min_price_room
required_parameters.description: The parameter "min_price_room" allows for establishing the minimum price for hotel rooms. The default minimum room price is set to 'None' if nothing is specified or if the user is not booking a hotel.

required_parameters.name: max_price_room
required_parameters.description: The parameter "max_price_room" allows for establishing the maximum price for hotel rooms. The default maximum room price is set to 'None' if nothing is specified or if the user is not booking a hotel.

api_list.api_description: Make a travel or hotel booking

required_parameters.name: booking_type
required_parameters.description: The parameter booking_type allows users to choose between different booking types, including 'hotels', 'trip tickets', or both simultaneously.

required_parameters.name: means_of_transportation
required_parameters.description: The parameter "means_of_transportation" allows users to choose a transportation type from options including 'flight', 'train', 'bus', or 'cruise'. The default transportation_type is set to 'None' if no specific transportation type is specified.

required_parameters.name: location_from
required_parameters.description: The "location_from" parameter specifies the departure location. The default "location_from" value is set to 'None' if no origin is specified or if the user is not booking a travel ticket.

required_parameters.name: location_to
required_parameters.description: The "location_to" parameter allows you to specify the arrival location. The default "location_to" value is set to 'None' if no destination is specified or if the user is not booking a travel ticket.

required_parameters.name: min_price_ticket
required_parameters.description: The parameter "min_price_ticket" is used to establish the minimum price at which the user wants to buy tickets for. The default minimum price is set to 'None' if nothing is specified.

required_parameters.name: max_price_ticket
required_parameters.description: The parameter "max_price_ticket" is used to establish the maximum price at which the user wants to buy tickets for. The default maximum price is set to 'None' if nothing is specified.

required_parameters.name: num_adults
required_parameters.description: The parameter "num_adults" represents the number of adults. The default number of adults is set to 'None' if nothing is specified.

required_parameters.name: num_children
required_parameters.description: The parameter "num_children" represents the number of children. The default number of children is set to 'None' if nothing is specified.

required_parameters.name: departure_date
required_parameters.description: The "departure_date" parameter represents the departure date for a trip when booking trip tickets. The date must be in comma separated month, date, year. The default departure date is set to 'None' if nothing is specified.

required_parameters.name: return_date
required_parameters.description: The "return_date" parameter allows the user to specify the return date for a trip. The date must be in comma separated month, date, year. The default return date is set to 'None' if nothing is specified.

required_parameters.name: location
required_parameters.description: The "location" parameter is to set the location for the search area. The default hotel location is set to 'None' if nothing is specified.

required_parameters.name: checkin_date
required_parameters.description: The parameter "checkin_date" is used to establish the date for checking into a hotel. The date must be in comma separated month, date, year. The default checkin date is set to 'None' if nothing is specified or if the user is not booking a hotel.

required_parameters.name: checkout_date
required_parameters.description: The parameter "checkout_date" is used to establish the date for checking out of a hotel. The date must be in comma separated month, date, year. The default checkout date is set to 'None' if nothing is specified or if the user is not booking a hotel.

required_parameters.name: num_rooms
required_parameters.description: The parameter "num_rooms" allows users to specify the number of hotel rooms they intend to book. The default number of rooms is set to 'None' if nothing is specified or if the user is not booking a hotel.

required_parameters.name: room_type
required_parameters.description: The parameter "room_type" allows users to choose the type of hotel room they prefer from a selection that includes 'King Bed', 'Queen Bed', 'Double', and 'Luxury'. The default room type is set to 'None' if nothing is specified or if the user is not booking a hotel.

required_parameters.name: min_price_room
required_parameters.description: The parameter "min_price_room" allows for establishing the minimum price for hotel rooms. The default minimum room price is set to 'None' if nothing is specified or if the user is not booking a hotel.

required_parameters.name: max_price_room
required_parameters.description: The parameter "max_price_room" allows for establishing the maximum price for hotel rooms. The default maximum room price is set to 'None' if nothing is specified or if the user is not booking a hotel.

api_list.api_description: Search for cat images, with optional requirements: image size, image type, search order, number of results, and cat breeds

optional_parameters.name: size
optional_parameters.description: The "size" parameter, which is optional, determines the size of the image to be returned and can be set to one of three options: 'small', 'med', or 'full'. The default size, if not specified, is 'med'.

optional_parameters.name: mime_types
optional_parameters.description: The "mime_types" parameter is an optional setting that accepts a comma-delimited string of image types, including 'gif', 'jpg', and 'png'. By default, if user doesn't mention anything, it returns images of all available types, which are 'jpg', 'gif', and 'png'.

optional_parameters.name: order
optional_parameters.description: The "order" parameter is an optional parameter that specifies the desired order in which to return results. It can be set to one of three options: 'RANDOM' to retrieve results in a random order, 'ASC' to retrieve results in ascending order, or 'DESC' to retrieve results in descending order. The default order is set to 'RANDOM' if no specific order is specified.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: The "limit" parameter is an optional integer value that specifies the number of results to be returned. It allows you to request up to a maximum of 25 results, with the default value being set to 1 if no specific limit is provided.

optional_parameters.name: breeds
optional_parameters.description: The "breeds" parameter is an optional field that accepts a comma-delimited string of breed abbreviations, allowing users to specify one or more specific breeds when making a request or query.

optional_parameters.name: breeds

optional_parameters.name: order

It can be set to one of three options: 'RANDOM' to retrieve results in a random order, 'ASC' to retrieve results in ascending order, or 'DESC' to retrieve results in descending order. The default order is set to 'RANDOM' if no specific order is specified.

optional_parameters.name: limit

optional_parameters.name: breeds

api_list.api_description: Make a travel or hotel booking

required_parameters.name: booking_type
required_parameters.description: The parameter booking_type allows users to choose between different booking types, including 'hotels', 'trip tickets', or both simultaneously.

required_parameters.name: means_of_transportation
required_parameters.description: The parameter "means_of_transportation" allows users to choose a transportation type from options including 'flight', 'train', 'bus', or 'cruise'. The default transportation_type is set to 'None' if no specific transportation type is specified.

required_parameters.name: location_from
required_parameters.description: The "location_from" parameter specifies the departure location. The default "location_from" value is set to 'None' if no origin is specified or if the user is not booking a travel ticket.

required_parameters.name: location_to
required_parameters.description: The "location_to" parameter allows you to specify the arrival location. The default "location_to" value is set to 'None' if no destination is specified or if the user is not booking a travel ticket.

required_parameters.name: min_price_ticket
required_parameters.description: The parameter "min_price_ticket" is used to establish the minimum price at which the user wants to buy tickets for. The default minimum price is set to 'None' if nothing is specified.

required_parameters.name: max_price_ticket
required_parameters.description: The parameter "max_price_ticket" is used to establish the maximum price at which the user wants to buy tickets for. The default maximum price is set to 'None' if nothing is specified.

required_parameters.name: num_adults
required_parameters.description: The parameter "num_adults" represents the number of adults. The default number of adults is set to 'None' if nothing is specified.

required_parameters.name: num_children
required_parameters.description: The parameter "num_children" represents the number of children. The default number of children is set to 'None' if nothing is specified.

required_parameters.name: departure_date
required_parameters.description: The "departure_date" parameter represents the departure date for a trip when booking trip tickets. The date must be in comma separated month, date, year. The default departure date is set to 'None' if nothing is specified.

required_parameters.name: return_date
required_parameters.description: The "return_date" parameter allows the user to specify the return date for a trip. The date must be in comma separated month, date, year. The default return date is set to 'None' if nothing is specified.

required_parameters.name: location
required_parameters.description: The "location" parameter is to set the location for the search area. The default hotel location is set to 'None' if nothing is specified.

required_parameters.name: checkin_date
required_parameters.description: The parameter "checkin_date" is used to establish the date for checking into a hotel. The date must be in comma separated month, date, year. The default checkin date is set to 'None' if nothing is specified or if the user is not booking a hotel.

required_parameters.name: checkout_date
required_parameters.description: The parameter "checkout_date" is used to establish the date for checking out of a hotel. The date must be in comma separated month, date, year. The default checkout date is set to 'None' if nothing is specified or if the user is not booking a hotel.

required_parameters.name: num_rooms
required_parameters.description: The parameter "num_rooms" allows users to specify the number of hotel rooms they intend to book. The default number of rooms is set to 'None' if nothing is specified or if the user is not booking a hotel.

required_parameters.name: room_type
required_parameters.description: The parameter "room_type" allows users to choose the type of hotel room they prefer from a selection that includes 'King Bed', 'Queen Bed', 'Double', and 'Luxury'. The default room type is set to 'None' if nothing is specified or if the user is not booking a hotel.

required_parameters.name: min_price_room
required_parameters.description: The parameter "min_price_room" allows for establishing the minimum price for hotel rooms. The default minimum room price is set to 'None' if nothing is specified or if the user is not booking a hotel.

required_parameters.name: max_price_room
required_parameters.description: The parameter "max_price_room" allows for establishing the maximum price for hotel rooms. The default maximum room price is set to 'None' if nothing is specified or if the user is not booking a hotel.

optional_parameters.name: size

optional_parameters.name: mime_types
optional_parameters.description: The "mime_types" parameter is an optional setting that accepts a comma-delimited string of image types, including 'gif', 'jpg', and 'png'. By default, if user doesn't mention anything, it returns images of all available types, which are 'jpg', 'gif', and 'png'.

optional_parameters.name: order
optional_parameters.description: The "order" parameter is an optional parameter that specifies the desired order in which to return results. It can be set to one of three options: 'RANDOM' to retrieve results in a random order, 'ASC' to retrieve results in ascending order, or 'DESC' to retrieve results in descending order. The default order is set to 'RANDOM' if no specific order is specified.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: The "limit" parameter is an optional integer value that specifies the number of results to be returned. It allows you to request up to a maximum of 25 results, with the default value being set to 1 if no specific limit is provided.

optional_parameters.name: breeds
optional_parameters.description: The "breeds" parameter is an optional field that accepts a comma-delimited string of breed abbreviations, allowing users to specify one or more specific breeds when making a request or query.

api_list.api_description: Make a travel or hotel booking

required_parameters.name: booking_type
required_parameters.description: The parameter booking_type allows users to choose between different booking types, including 'hotels', 'trip tickets', or both simultaneously.

required_parameters.name: means_of_transportation
required_parameters.description: The parameter "means_of_transportation" allows users to choose a transportation type from options including 'flight', 'train', 'bus', or 'cruise'. The default transportation_type is set to 'None' if no specific transportation type is specified.

required_parameters.name: location_from
required_parameters.description: The "location_from" parameter specifies the departure location. The default "location_from" value is set to 'None' if no origin is specified or if the user is not booking a travel ticket.

required_parameters.name: location_to
required_parameters.description: The "location_to" parameter allows you to specify the arrival location. The default "location_to" value is set to 'None' if no destination is specified or if the user is not booking a travel ticket.

required_parameters.name: min_price_ticket
required_parameters.description: The parameter "min_price_ticket" is used to establish the minimum price at which the user wants to buy tickets for. The default minimum price is set to 'None' if nothing is specified.

required_parameters.name: max_price_ticket
required_parameters.description: The parameter "max_price_ticket" is used to establish the maximum price at which the user wants to buy tickets for. The default maximum price is set to 'None' if nothing is specified.

required_parameters.name: num_adults
required_parameters.description: The parameter "num_adults" represents the number of adults. The default number of adults is set to 'None' if nothing is specified.

required_parameters.name: num_children
required_parameters.description: The parameter "num_children" represents the number of children. The default number of children is set to 'None' if nothing is specified.

required_parameters.name: departure_date
required_parameters.description: The "departure_date" parameter represents the departure date for a trip when booking trip tickets. The date must be in comma separated month, date, year. The default departure date is set to 'None' if nothing is specified.

required_parameters.name: return_date
required_parameters.description: The "return_date" parameter allows the user to specify the return date for a trip. The date must be in comma separated month, date, year. The default return date is set to 'None' if nothing is specified.

required_parameters.name: location
required_parameters.description: The "location" parameter is to set the location for the search area. The default hotel location is set to 'None' if nothing is specified.

required_parameters.name: checkin_date
required_parameters.description: The parameter "checkin_date" is used to establish the date for checking into a hotel. The date must be in comma separated month, date, year. The default checkin date is set to 'None' if nothing is specified or if the user is not booking a hotel.

required_parameters.name: checkout_date
required_parameters.description: The parameter "checkout_date" is used to establish the date for checking out of a hotel. The date must be in comma separated month, date, year. The default checkout date is set to 'None' if nothing is specified or if the user is not booking a hotel.

required_parameters.name: num_rooms
required_parameters.description: The parameter "num_rooms" allows users to specify the number of hotel rooms they intend to book. The default number of rooms is set to 'None' if nothing is specified or if the user is not booking a hotel.

required_parameters.name: room_type
required_parameters.description: The parameter "room_type" allows users to choose the type of hotel room they prefer from a selection that includes 'King Bed', 'Queen Bed', 'Double', and 'Luxury'. The default room type is set to 'None' if nothing is specified or if the user is not booking a hotel.

required_parameters.name: min_price_room
required_parameters.description: The parameter "min_price_room" allows for establishing the minimum price for hotel rooms. The default minimum room price is set to 'None' if nothing is specified or if the user is not booking a hotel.

required_parameters.name: max_price_room
required_parameters.description: The parameter "max_price_room" allows for establishing the maximum price for hotel rooms. The default maximum room price is set to 'None' if nothing is specified or if the user is not booking a hotel.

api_list.api_description: Search homes for buying or renting

required_parameters.name: location
required_parameters.description: The "location" parameter is to set the location for the search area. The default hotel location is set to 'None' if nothing is specified.

required_parameters.name: home_type
required_parameters.description: The "home_type" parameter represents home types for search. For home buying, home_types choices are: "House", "Townhouse", "Condo", "Land", "Multi-family", "Mobile", "Co-op"; for home renting, home_types choices are: "House", "Townhouse", "Condo", "Apartment". The default select_home_type is set to 'None' if nothing is specified.

required_parameters.name: buy_or_rent
required_parameters.description: The "buy_or_rent" parameter is to specify whether to search homes for buying or renting. It can be chosen from 'buy' or 'rent'.

required_parameters.name: floor_number
required_parameters.description: The "floor_number" parameter represents the floor number. The default floor_number is set to 'None' if nothing is specified.

required_parameters.name: max_commute_time
required_parameters.description: The "max_commute_time" parameter represents the maximum commute time in minute to office location, assuming the office location is already defined. The default max_commute_time is set to 'None' if nothing is specified.

required_parameters.name: max_price
required_parameters.description: The "max_price" parameter represents the maximum home price in dollars. The default max_price is set to 'None' if nothing is specified.

required_parameters.name: max_square_feet
required_parameters.description: The "max_square_feet" parameter represents the maximum home size in square feet. The default max_square_feet is set to 'None' if nothing is specified.

required_parameters.name: min_price
required_parameters.description: The "min_price" parameter represents the minimum home price in dollars. The default min_price is set to 'None' if nothing is specified.

required_parameters.name: min_square_feet
required_parameters.description: The "min_square_feet" parameter represents the minimum home size in square feet. The default min_square_feet is set to 'None' if nothing is specified.

required_parameters.name: num_balconies
required_parameters.description: The "num_balconies" parameter represents the number of balconies. The default num_balconies is set to 'None' if nothing is specified.

required_parameters.name: num_baths
required_parameters.description: The "num_baths" parameter represents the number of bathrooms. The default num_baths is set to 'None' if nothing is specified.

required_parameters.name: num_beds
required_parameters.description: The "num_beds" parameter represents the number of bedrooms. The default num_beds is set to 'None' if nothing is specified.

required_parameters.name: num_garages

required_parameters.description: The "location" parameter is to set the location for the search area. The default hotel location is set to 'None' if nothing is specified.

required_parameters.name: home_type
required_parameters.description: The "home_type" parameter represents home types for search. For home buying, home_types choices are: "House", "Townhouse", "Condo", "Land", "Multi-family", "Mobile", "Co-op"; for home renting, home_types choices are: "House", "Townhouse", "Condo", "Apartment". The default select_home_type is set to 'None' if nothing is specified.

required_parameters.name: buy_or_rent
required_parameters.description: The "buy_or_rent" parameter is to specify whether to search homes for buying or renting. It can be chosen from 'buy' or 'rent'.

required_parameters.name: floor_number
required_parameters.description: The "floor_number" parameter represents the floor number. The default floor_number is set to 'None' if nothing is specified.

required_parameters.name: max_commute_time
required_parameters.description: The "max_commute_time" parameter represents the maximum commute time in minute to office location, assuming the office location is already defined. The default max_commute_time is set to 'None' if nothing is specified.

required_parameters.name: max_price
required_parameters.description: The "max_price" parameter represents the maximum home price in dollars. The default max_price is set to 'None' if nothing is specified.

required_parameters.name: max_square_feet
required_parameters.description: The "max_square_feet" parameter represents the maximum home size in square feet. The default max_square_feet is set to 'None' if nothing is specified.

required_parameters.name: min_price
required_parameters.description: The "min_price" parameter represents the minimum home price in dollars. The default min_price is set to 'None' if nothing is specified.

required_parameters.name: min_square_feet
required_parameters.description: The "min_square_feet" parameter represents the minimum home size in square feet. The default min_square_feet is set to 'None' if nothing is specified.

required_parameters.name: num_balconies
required_parameters.description: The "num_balconies" parameter represents the number of balconies. The default num_balconies is set to 'None' if nothing is specified.

required_parameters.name: num_baths
required_parameters.description: The "num_baths" parameter represents the number of bathrooms. The default num_baths is set to 'None' if nothing is specified.

required_parameters.name: num_beds
required_parameters.description: The "num_beds" parameter represents the number of bedrooms. The default num_beds is set to 'None' if nothing is specified.

required_parameters.name: num_garages
required_parameters.description: The "num_garages" parameter represents the number of garages. The default num_garages is set to 'None' if nothing is specified.

required_parameters.name: num_swimming_pools
required_parameters.description: The "num_swimming_pools" parameter represents the number of swimming pools. The default num_swimming_pools is set to 'None' if nothing is specified.

api_list.api_description: Search for cat images, with optional requirements: image size, image type, search order, number of results, and cat breeds

optional_parameters.name: size
optional_parameters.description: The "size" parameter, which is optional, determines the size of the image to be returned and can be set to one of three options: 'small', 'med', or 'full'. The default size, if not specified, is 'med'.

optional_parameters.name: mime_types
optional_parameters.description: The "mime_types" parameter is an optional setting that accepts a comma-delimited string of image types, including 'gif', 'jpg', and 'png'. By default, if user doesn't mention anything, it returns images of all available types, which are 'jpg', 'gif', and 'png'.

optional_parameters.name: order
optional_parameters.description: The "order" parameter is an optional parameter that specifies the desired order in which to return results. It can be set to one of three options: 'RANDOM' to retrieve results in a random order, 'ASC' to retrieve results in ascending order, or 'DESC' to retrieve results in descending order. The default order is set to 'RANDOM' if no specific order is specified.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: The "limit" parameter is an optional integer value that specifies the number of results to be returned. It allows you to request up to a maximum of 25 results, with the default value being set to 1 if no specific limit is provided.

optional_parameters.name: breeds
optional_parameters.description: The "breeds" parameter is an optional field that accepts a comma-delimited string of breed abbreviations, allowing users to specify one or more specific breeds when making a request or query.

api_list.api_description: Make a travel or hotel booking

required_parameters.name: booking_type
required_parameters.description: The parameter booking_type allows users to choose between different booking types, including 'hotels', 'trip tickets', or both simultaneously.

required_parameters.name: means_of_transportation
required_parameters.description: The parameter "means_of_transportation" allows users to choose a transportation type from options including 'flight', 'train', 'bus', or 'cruise'. The default transportation_type is set to 'None' if no specific transportation type is specified.

required_parameters.name: location_from
required_parameters.description: The "location_from" parameter specifies the departure location. The default "location_from" value is set to 'None' if no origin is specified or if the user is not booking a travel ticket.

required_parameters.name: location_to
required_parameters.description: The "location_to" parameter allows you to specify the arrival location. The default "location_to" value is set to 'None' if no destination is specified or if the user is not booking a travel ticket.

required_parameters.name: min_price_ticket
required_parameters.description: The parameter "min_price_ticket" is used to establish the minimum price at which the user wants to buy tickets for. The default minimum price is set to 'None' if nothing is specified.

required_parameters.name: max_price_ticket
required_parameters.description: The parameter "max_price_ticket" is used to establish the maximum price at which the user wants to buy tickets for. The default maximum price is set to 'None' if nothing is specified.

required_parameters.name: num_adults
required_parameters.description: The parameter "num_adults" represents the number of adults. The default number of adults is set to 'None' if nothing is specified.

required_parameters.name: num_children
required_parameters.description: The parameter "num_children" represents the number of children. The default number of children is set to 'None' if nothing is specified.

required_parameters.name: departure_date
required_parameters.description: The "departure_date" parameter represents the departure date for a trip when booking trip tickets. The date must be in comma separated month, date, year. The default departure date is set to 'None' if nothing is specified.

required_parameters.name: return_date
required_parameters.description: The "return_date" parameter allows the user to specify the return date for a trip. The date must be in comma separated month, date, year. The default return date is set to 'None' if nothing is specified.

required_parameters.name: location
required_parameters.description: The "location" parameter is to set the location for the search area. The default hotel location is set to 'None' if nothing is specified.

required_parameters.name: checkin_date
required_parameters.description: The parameter "checkin_date" is used to establish the date for checking into a hotel. The date must be in comma separated month, date, year. The default checkin date is set to 'None' if nothing is specified or if the user is not booking a hotel.

required_parameters.name: checkout_date
required_parameters.description: The parameter "checkout_date" is used to establish the date for checking out of a hotel. The date must be in comma separated month, date, year. The default checkout date is set to 'None' if nothing is specified or if the user is not booking a hotel.

required_parameters.name: num_rooms
required_parameters.description: The parameter "num_rooms" allows users to specify the number of hotel rooms they intend to book. The default number of rooms is set to 'None' if nothing is specified or if the user is not booking a hotel.

required_parameters.name: room_type
required_parameters.description: The parameter "room_type" allows users to choose the type of hotel room they prefer from a selection that includes 'King Bed', 'Queen Bed', 'Double', and 'Luxury'. The default room type is set to 'None' if nothing is specified or if the user is not booking a hotel.

required_parameters.name: min_price_room
required_parameters.description: The parameter "min_price_room" allows for establishing the minimum price for hotel rooms. The default minimum room price is set to 'None' if nothing is specified or if the user is not booking a hotel.

required_parameters.name: max_price_room
required_parameters.description: The parameter "max_price_room" allows for establishing the maximum price for hotel rooms. The default maximum room price is set to 'None' if nothing is specified or if the user is not booking a hotel.

api_list.api_description: Make a travel or hotel booking

required_parameters.name: booking_type
required_parameters.description: The parameter booking_type allows users to choose between different booking types, including 'hotels', 'trip tickets', or both simultaneously.

required_parameters.name: means_of_transportation
required_parameters.description: The parameter "means_of_transportation" allows users to choose a transportation type from options including 'flight', 'train', 'bus', or 'cruise'. The default transportation_type is set to 'None' if no specific transportation type is specified.

required_parameters.name: location_from
required_parameters.description: The "location_from" parameter specifies the departure location. The default "location_from" value is set to 'None' if no origin is specified or if the user is not booking a travel ticket.

required_parameters.name: location_to
required_parameters.description: The "location_to" parameter allows you to specify the arrival location. The default "location_to" value is set to 'None' if no destination is specified or if the user is not booking a travel ticket.

required_parameters.name: min_price_ticket
required_parameters.description: The parameter "min_price_ticket" is used to establish the minimum price at which the user wants to buy tickets for. The default minimum price is set to 'None' if nothing is specified.

required_parameters.name: max_price_ticket
required_parameters.description: The parameter "max_price_ticket" is used to establish the maximum price at which the user wants to buy tickets for. The default maximum price is set to 'None' if nothing is specified.

required_parameters.name: num_adults
required_parameters.description: The parameter "num_adults" represents the number of adults. The default number of adults is set to 'None' if nothing is specified.

required_parameters.name: num_children
required_parameters.description: The parameter "num_children" represents the number of children. The default number of children is set to 'None' if nothing is specified.

required_parameters.name: departure_date
required_parameters.description: The "departure_date" parameter represents the departure date for a trip when booking trip tickets. The date must be in comma separated month, date, year. The default departure date is set to 'None' if nothing is specified.

required_parameters.name: return_date
required_parameters.description: The "return_date" parameter allows the user to specify the return date for a trip. The date must be in comma separated month, date, year. The default return date is set to 'None' if nothing is specified.

required_parameters.name: location
required_parameters.description: The "location" parameter is to set the location for the search area. The default hotel location is set to 'None' if nothing is specified.

required_parameters.name: checkin_date
required_parameters.description: The parameter "checkin_date" is used to establish the date for checking into a hotel. The date must be in comma separated month, date, year. The default checkin date is set to 'None' if nothing is specified or if the user is not booking a hotel.

required_parameters.name: checkout_date
required_parameters.description: The parameter "checkout_date" is used to establish the date for checking out of a hotel. The date must be in comma separated month, date, year. The default checkout date is set to 'None' if nothing is specified or if the user is not booking a hotel.

required_parameters.name: num_rooms
required_parameters.description: The parameter "num_rooms" allows users to specify the number of hotel rooms they intend to book. The default number of rooms is set to 'None' if nothing is specified or if the user is not booking a hotel.

required_parameters.name: room_type
required_parameters.description: The parameter "room_type" allows users to choose the type of hotel room they prefer from a selection that includes 'King Bed', 'Queen Bed', 'Double', and 'Luxury'. The default room type is set to 'None' if nothing is specified or if the user is not booking a hotel.

required_parameters.name: min_price_room
required_parameters.description: The parameter "min_price_room" allows for establishing the minimum price for hotel rooms. The default minimum room price is set to 'None' if nothing is specified or if the user is not booking a hotel.

required_parameters.name: max_price_room
required_parameters.description: The parameter "max_price_room" allows for establishing the maximum price for hotel rooms. The default maximum room price is set to 'None' if nothing is specified or if the user is not booking a hotel.

required_parameters.name: location
required_parameters.description: The "location" parameter is to set the location for the search area. The default hotel location is set to 'None' if nothing is specified.

required_parameters.name: max_commute_time

required_parameters.name: max_price

api_list.api_description: Search for cat images, with optional requirements: image size, image type, search order, number of results, and cat breeds

optional_parameters.name: size
optional_parameters.description: The "size" parameter, which is optional, determines the size of the image to be returned and can be set to one of three options: 'small', 'med', or 'full'. The default size, if not specified, is 'med'.

optional_parameters.name: mime_types
optional_parameters.description: The "mime_types" parameter is an optional setting that accepts a comma-delimited string of image types, including 'gif', 'jpg', and 'png'. By default, if user doesn't mention anything, it returns images of all available types, which are 'jpg', 'gif', and 'png'.

optional_parameters.name: order
optional_parameters.description: The "order" parameter is an optional parameter that specifies the desired order in which to return results. It can be set to one of three options: 'RANDOM' to retrieve results in a random order, 'ASC' to retrieve results in ascending order, or 'DESC' to retrieve results in descending order. The default order is set to 'RANDOM' if no specific order is specified.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: The "limit" parameter is an optional integer value that specifies the number of results to be returned. It allows you to request up to a maximum of 25 results, with the default value being set to 1 if no specific limit is provided.

optional_parameters.name: breeds
optional_parameters.description: The "breeds" parameter is an optional field that accepts a comma-delimited string of breed abbreviations, allowing users to specify one or more specific breeds when making a request or query.

optional_parameters.name: size
optional_parameters.description: The "size" parameter, which is optional, determines the size of the image to be returned and can be set to one of three options: 'small', 'med', or 'full'. The default size, if not specified, is 'med'.

optional_parameters.name: mime_types
optional_parameters.description: The "mime_types" parameter is an optional setting that accepts a comma-delimited string of image types, including 'gif', 'jpg', and 'png'. By default, if user doesn't mention anything, it returns images of all available types, which are 'jpg', 'gif', and 'png'.

optional_parameters.name: order
optional_parameters.description: The "order" parameter is an optional parameter that specifies the desired order in which to return results. It can be set to one of three options: 'RANDOM' to retrieve results in a random order, 'ASC' to retrieve results in ascending order, or 'DESC' to retrieve results in descending order. The default order is set to 'RANDOM' if no specific order is specified.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: The "limit" parameter is an optional integer value that specifies the number of results to be returned. It allows you to request up to a maximum of 25 results, with the default value being set to 1 if no specific limit is provided.

optional_parameters.name: breeds
optional_parameters.description: The "breeds" parameter is an optional field that accepts a comma-delimited string of breed abbreviations, allowing users to specify one or more specific breeds when making a request or query.

api_list.api_description: Make a travel or hotel booking

required_parameters.name: booking_type
required_parameters.description: The parameter booking_type allows users to choose between different booking types, including 'hotels', 'trip tickets', or both simultaneously.

required_parameters.name: means_of_transportation
required_parameters.description: The parameter "means_of_transportation" allows users to choose a transportation type from options including 'flight', 'train', 'bus', or 'cruise'. The default transportation_type is set to 'None' if no specific transportation type is specified.

required_parameters.name: location_from
required_parameters.description: The "location_from" parameter specifies the departure location. The default "location_from" value is set to 'None' if no origin is specified or if the user is not booking a travel ticket.

required_parameters.name: location_to
required_parameters.description: The "location_to" parameter allows you to specify the arrival location. The default "location_to" value is set to 'None' if no destination is specified or if the user is not booking a travel ticket.

required_parameters.name: min_price_ticket
required_parameters.description: The parameter "min_price_ticket" is used to establish the minimum price at which the user wants to buy tickets for. The default minimum price is set to 'None' if nothing is specified.

required_parameters.name: max_price_ticket
required_parameters.description: The parameter "max_price_ticket" is used to establish the maximum price at which the user wants to buy tickets for. The default maximum price is set to 'None' if nothing is specified.

required_parameters.name: num_adults
required_parameters.description: The parameter "num_adults" represents the number of adults. The default number of adults is set to 'None' if nothing is specified.

required_parameters.name: num_children
required_parameters.description: The parameter "num_children" represents the number of children. The default number of children is set to 'None' if nothing is specified.

required_parameters.name: departure_date
required_parameters.description: The "departure_date" parameter represents the departure date for a trip when booking trip tickets. The date must be in comma separated month, date, year. The default departure date is set to 'None' if nothing is specified.

required_parameters.name: return_date
required_parameters.description: The "return_date" parameter allows the user to specify the return date for a trip. The date must be in comma separated month, date, year. The default return date is set to 'None' if nothing is specified.

required_parameters.name: location
required_parameters.description: The "location" parameter is to set the location for the search area. The default hotel location is set to 'None' if nothing is specified.

required_parameters.name: checkin_date
required_parameters.description: The parameter "checkin_date" is used to establish the date for checking into a hotel. The date must be in comma separated month, date, year. The default checkin date is set to 'None' if nothing is specified or if the user is not booking a hotel.

required_parameters.name: checkout_date
required_parameters.description: The parameter "checkout_date" is used to establish the date for checking out of a hotel. The date must be in comma separated month, date, year. The default checkout date is set to 'None' if nothing is specified or if the user is not booking a hotel.

required_parameters.name: num_rooms
required_parameters.description: The parameter "num_rooms" allows users to specify the number of hotel rooms they intend to book. The default number of rooms is set to 'None' if nothing is specified or if the user is not booking a hotel.

required_parameters.name: room_type
required_parameters.description: The parameter "room_type" allows users to choose the type of hotel room they prefer from a selection that includes 'King Bed', 'Queen Bed', 'Double', and 'Luxury'. The default room type is set to 'None' if nothing is specified or if the user is not booking a hotel.

required_parameters.name: min_price_room
required_parameters.description: The parameter "min_price_room" allows for establishing the minimum price for hotel rooms. The default minimum room price is set to 'None' if nothing is specified or if the user is not booking a hotel.

required_parameters.name: max_price_room
required_parameters.description: The parameter "max_price_room" allows for establishing the maximum price for hotel rooms. The default maximum room price is set to 'None' if nothing is specified or if the user is not booking a hotel.

optional_parameters.name: size
optional_parameters.description: The "size" parameter, which is optional, determines the size of the image to be returned and can be set to one of three options: 'small', 'med', or 'full'. The default size, if not specified, is 'med'.

optional_parameters.name: mime_types
optional_parameters.description: The "mime_types" parameter is an optional setting that accepts a comma-delimited string of image types, including 'gif', 'jpg', and 'png'. By default, if user doesn't mention anything, it returns images of all available types, which are 'jpg', 'gif', and 'png'.

optional_parameters.name: order
optional_parameters.description: The "order" parameter is an optional parameter that specifies the desired order in which to return results. It can be set to one of three options: 'RANDOM' to retrieve results in a random order, 'ASC' to retrieve results in ascending order, or 'DESC' to retrieve results in descending order. The default order is set to 'RANDOM' if no specific order is specified.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: The "limit" parameter is an optional integer value that specifies the number of results to be returned. It allows you to request up to a maximum of 25 results, with the default value being set to 1 if no specific limit is provided.

optional_parameters.name: breeds
optional_parameters.description: The "breeds" parameter is an optional field that accepts a comma-delimited string of breed abbreviations, allowing users to specify one or more specific breeds when making a request or query.

api_list.api_description: Make a travel or hotel booking

required_parameters.name: booking_type
required_parameters.description: The parameter booking_type allows users to choose between different booking types, including 'hotels', 'trip tickets', or both simultaneously.

required_parameters.name: means_of_transportation
required_parameters.description: The parameter "means_of_transportation" allows users to choose a transportation type from options including 'flight', 'train', 'bus', or 'cruise'. The default transportation_type is set to 'None' if no specific transportation type is specified.

required_parameters.name: location_from
required_parameters.description: The "location_from" parameter specifies the departure location. The default "location_from" value is set to 'None' if no origin is specified or if the user is not booking a travel ticket.

required_parameters.name: location_to
required_parameters.description: The "location_to" parameter allows you to specify the arrival location. The default "location_to" value is set to 'None' if no destination is specified or if the user is not booking a travel ticket.

required_parameters.name: min_price_ticket
required_parameters.description: The parameter "min_price_ticket" is used to establish the minimum price at which the user wants to buy tickets for. The default minimum price is set to 'None' if nothing is specified.

required_parameters.name: max_price_ticket
required_parameters.description: The parameter "max_price_ticket" is used to establish the maximum price at which the user wants to buy tickets for. The default maximum price is set to 'None' if nothing is specified.

required_parameters.name: num_adults
required_parameters.description: The parameter "num_adults" represents the number of adults. The default number of adults is set to 'None' if nothing is specified.

required_parameters.name: num_children
required_parameters.description: The parameter "num_children" represents the number of children. The default number of children is set to 'None' if nothing is specified.

required_parameters.name: departure_date
required_parameters.description: The "departure_date" parameter represents the departure date for a trip when booking trip tickets. The date must be in comma separated month, date, year. The default departure date is set to 'None' if nothing is specified.

required_parameters.name: return_date
required_parameters.description: The "return_date" parameter allows the user to specify the return date for a trip. The date must be in comma separated month, date, year. The default return date is set to 'None' if nothing is specified.

required_parameters.name: location
required_parameters.description: The "location" parameter is to set the location for the search area. The default hotel location is set to 'None' if nothing is specified.

required_parameters.name: checkin_date
required_parameters.description: The parameter "checkin_date" is used to establish the date for checking into a hotel. The date must be in comma separated month, date, year. The default checkin date is set to 'None' if nothing is specified or if the user is not booking a hotel.

required_parameters.name: checkout_date
required_parameters.description: The parameter "checkout_date" is used to establish the date for checking out of a hotel. The date must be in comma separated month, date, year. The default checkout date is set to 'None' if nothing is specified or if the user is not booking a hotel.

required_parameters.name: num_rooms
required_parameters.description: The parameter "num_rooms" allows users to specify the number of hotel rooms they intend to book. The default number of rooms is set to 'None' if nothing is specified or if the user is not booking a hotel.

required_parameters.name: room_type
required_parameters.description: The parameter "room_type" allows users to choose the type of hotel room they prefer from a selection that includes 'King Bed', 'Queen Bed', 'Double', and 'Luxury'. The default room type is set to 'None' if nothing is specified or if the user is not booking a hotel.

required_parameters.name: min_price_room
required_parameters.description: The parameter "min_price_room" allows for establishing the minimum price for hotel rooms. The default minimum room price is set to 'None' if nothing is specified or if the user is not booking a hotel.

required_parameters.name: max_price_room
required_parameters.description: The parameter "max_price_room" allows for establishing the maximum price for hotel rooms. The default maximum room price is set to 'None' if nothing is specified or if the user is not booking a hotel.

optional_parameters.name: size
optional_parameters.description: The "size" parameter, which is optional, determines the size of the image to be returned and can be set to one of three options: 'small', 'med', or 'full'. The default size, if not specified, is 'med'.

optional_parameters.name: mime_types
optional_parameters.description: The "mime_types" parameter is an optional setting that accepts a comma-delimited string of image types, including 'gif', 'jpg', and 'png'. By default, if user doesn't mention anything, it returns images of all available types, which are 'jpg', 'gif', and 'png'.

optional_parameters.name: order
optional_parameters.description: The "order" parameter is an optional parameter that specifies the desired order in which to return results. It can be set to one of three options: 'RANDOM' to retrieve results in a random order, 'ASC' to retrieve results in ascending order, or 'DESC' to retrieve results in descending order. The default order is set to 'RANDOM' if no specific order is specified.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: The "limit" parameter is an optional integer value that specifies the number of results to be returned. It allows you to request up to a maximum of 25 results, with the default value being set to 1 if no specific limit is provided.

optional_parameters.name: breeds
optional_parameters.description: The "breeds" parameter is an optional field that accepts a comma-delimited string of breed abbreviations, allowing users to specify one or more specific breeds when making a request or query.
